name: Sky Climber
description: Players race to stay alive and afloat in this simple platformer game. They climb through a variety of platforms that have different properties and traps on them, avoid enemies and collect powerups to help them climb through levels. As the levels progress, more platforms, enemies and powerups enter the game and the speed the platforms move increases. At the last level the heroine has to knock the Sky Pirate off the map to free her brother and win the game!
